Articles.Content: Hi!,I'm Ypkerbal and I am new to the game so I need some tips for beginners.

Welcome Ypkerbal!! The game basically uses all the laws of physics (that the game engine can actually run). There are many forums on here to help you to build a rocket, get into orbit, and maybe even get to the Mun!! Also check out the 'Spacecraft' exchange, where you can download other people's rockets.

By the way, if you got the demo, the latest version (0.16) needs to be paid for, but is worth it with new parts, better graphics, and E.V.A's!!! (Spacewalks)

Anyway, have a great time playing this game, as I have for many many hours

Dom
Hi Ypkerbal already welcomed you once, but if you need anything just ask around people are very friendly here
